example.text: Extreme MAGA Republicans are slashing the services that everyday Americans rely on, like Medicaid, food assistance, and even health care for veterans. They know their cuts are unpopular. That’s why they’re threatening to wreck our economy in order to get their way. [[url]]

There’s so many things we could do: expand programs like TPS, tackle the immigration case backlog, create pathways for citizenship for Dreamers, and address root causes for migration. The GOP needs to stop playing politics and come to the table with workable solutions.

Last year, I sent a letter to [[user]] with my colleagues urging the agency to end its ban on blood donations from gay and bisexual men. Today, they heeded our call and based their policies on science — not outdated homophobic beliefs. [[url]]
[[user]] the Republican Party might excuse lying and corruption, but no one is above the law. Trump learned that lesson today, too. [[url]]

Extreme MAGA Republicans are slashing the services that everyday Americans rely on, like Medicaid, food assistance, and even health care for veterans. They know their cuts are unpopular. That’s why they’re threatening to wreck our economy in order to get their way. [[url]]

Tomorrow, the public health emergency expires — & so does expanded SNAP eligibility for college students. That means thousands of students will be wondering when they’ll get their next meal. I reintroduced my #EATSAct w/ [[user]] to expand access to SNAP permanently. 1/ [[url]]
